name: Earthquake
description: A sudden shaking of the ground caused by seismic waves.
precautions: Drop, Cover, Hold On. Stay away from windows.

name: Tsunami
description: A series of large ocean waves due to underwater earthquakes or volcanic eruptions.
precautions: Move to higher ground, Avoid beaches.

name: Flood
description: Overflow of water that submerges land.
precautions: Avoid floodwater, Move to higher ground.

name: Hurricane
description: A violent storm with strong winds and rain.

name: Heatwave
description: A prolonged period of extreme high temperatures causing health issues.
causes: Climate change, high-pressure systems, urban heat effect.
precautions: Stay hydrated, avoid outdoor activities, use cooling systems.

causes: Heavy rain, earthquakes, deforestation, human activities.
precautions: Avoid steep slopes, plant trees to stabilize soil, follow warnings.

name: Volcanic Eruption
description: The release of molten lava, ash, and gases from a volcano, causing destruction.
causes: Magma pressure buildup, tectonic movements, earthquakes.
precautions: Stay indoors, wear masks, evacuate if necessary.

name: Wildfire
description: An uncontrolled fire spreading rapidly in forests or grasslands.
causes: Dry weather, lightning, human negligence, strong winds.
precautions: Avoid open flames, clear flammable vegetation, follow fire bans.

name: Blizzard
description: A severe snowstorm with strong winds and low visibility, leading to extreme cold.
causes: Cold air masses, moisture, strong winds.
precautions: Stay indoors, wear warm clothing, stock up on supplies.

name: Drought
description: A long period of insufficient rainfall leading to water shortages.
causes: Climate change, deforestation, overuse of water.
precautions: Conserve water, implement sustainable farming, store water efficiently.
